relevant_findings.general: Well developed, well nourished man, mild NAD. Oriented x3.
relevant_findings.heent: Normocephalic atraumatic, sclera anicteric, PERRL, EOMI, conjunctiva pink, no pallor or cyanosis.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Irregular rhythm and tachycardia, no murmurs appreciated.
relevant_findings.lungs: Rhonchi and bibasilar rales with intermittent cough.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, no hepatomegaly or splenomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, no clubbing or cyanosis, 2+ pitting edema up to knees.

relevant_findings.abdomen: Well healed surgical scar, soft, mild diffuse tenderness.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Changes in heart rate from 100 bpm in ED to 114 bpm at admission. Notable worsening in bilateral lower extremity edema reported by patient.
